project.name: Moltbot
project.tagline: Your Private AI Assistant, Available Anywhere (formerly Clawdbot)
project.description: Run your personal AI assistant on your own devices, seamlessly connecting to WhatsApp, Telegram, Slack, and 12+ other channels. Features browser automation, multi-device collaboration, voice interaction, with all data staying local for complete privacy.

features.title: Why Choose Moltbot?
features.subtitle: Powerful, Private, and Easy-to-Deploy Personal AI Assistant

list.title: üåê Unified Channels
list.desc: Manage 12+ messaging platforms like WhatsApp, Telegram, Slack with a single configuration

list.title: üîí Local-First
list.desc: All data and AI runtime stay on your devices, zero privacy leaks

list.title: üõ†Ô∏è Powerful Toolchain
list.desc: Browser automation, cron jobs, webhooks, and more extensibility

list.title: üì± Multi-Device
list.desc: Connect macOS/iOS/Android nodes to execute local operations

list.title: üé§ Voice Interaction
list.desc: Supports Voice Wake, Talk Mode, and multiple TTS engines

list.title: üß† Memory System
list.desc: Vectorized storage and semantic search for AI that remembers every conversation

list.title: üîê Secure Isolation
list.desc: Sandbox isolation, DM pairing protection, and tool permission control

items.title: Quick Start
items.desc: Guide users through first installation, configuration, and startup of Moltbot

items.title: Onboarding Wizard
items.desc: Complete Gateway, channel, and model configuration through interactive wizard

items.title: Starting Gateway
items.desc: Learn how to start the Gateway daemon, different modes (dev/production)

items.title: Send First Message
items.desc: Send your first message to the AI assistant via WebChat or configured channels

items.title: DM Pairing & Access Control
items.desc: Understand the default DM pairing protection mechanism, how to approve unknown senders

items.title: Multi-Channel Overview
items.desc: Learn about all communication channels supported by Moltbot and their features

items.title: WhatsApp Channel
items.desc: Configure and use WhatsApp channel (based on Baileys)

items.title: Telegram Channel
items.desc: Configure and use Telegram channel (based on grammY Bot API)

items.title: Slack Channel
items.desc: Configure and use Slack channel (based on Bolt)

items.title: Discord Channel
items.desc: Configure and use Discord channel (based on discord.js)

items.title: Google Chat Channel
items.desc: Configure and use Google Chat channel

items.title: Signal Channel
items.desc: Configure and use Signal channel (based on signal-cli)

items.title: iMessage Channel
items.desc: Configure and use iMessage channel (macOS exclusive)

items.title: LINE Channel
items.desc: Configure and use LINE channel (Messaging API)

items.title: WebChat Interface
items.desc: Use the built-in WebChat interface to interact with the AI assistant

items.title: macOS App
items.desc: Learn about the macOS menu bar app features and Voice Wake/Talk Mode

items.title: iOS Node
items.desc: Configure iOS node to execute device local operations (Camera, Canvas, Voice Wake)

items.title: Android Node
items.desc: Configure Android node to execute device local operations (Camera, Canvas)

items.title: AI Models & Authentication
items.desc: Configure AI model providers (Anthropic, OpenAI, OpenRouter, Ollama, etc.) and authentication methods

items.title: Session Management & Multi-Agent
items.desc: Learn session model, session isolation, sub-agent collaboration, context compression

items.title: Browser Automation Tool
items.desc: Use browser tools for web automation, screenshots, form manipulation, etc.

items.title: Command Execution Tool & Approvals
items.desc: Configure and use exec tool, understand security approval mechanism

items.title: Web Search & Fetch Tools
items.desc: Use web_search and web_fetch tools for web searching and content scraping

items.title: Canvas Visual Interface & A2UI
items.desc: Understand Canvas A2UI push mechanism, visual interface operations

items.title: Voice Wake & Text-to-Speech
items.desc: Configure Voice Wake, Talk Mode, and TTS providers

items.title: Memory System & Vector Search
items.desc: Configure and use memory system (SQLite-vec, FTS5, hybrid search)

items.title: Cron Jobs & Webhook
items.desc: Configure cron jobs, webhook triggers, Gmail Pub/Sub

items.title: Skills Platform & MoltHub
items.desc: Understand skill system, Bundled/Managed/Workspace skills, MoltHub integration

items.title: Security & Sandbox Isolation
items.desc: Understand security model, tool permission control, Sandbox isolation, Docker deployment

items.title: Troubleshooting
items.desc: Solve common issues: Gateway startup failures, channel connection problems, authentication errors, tool invocation failures

items.title: CLI Commands Reference
items.desc: Complete CLI command list and usage documentation

items.title: Performance Optimization
items.desc: Optimize Gateway performance, reduce latency, memory management, concurrency control
